lstDialogOne: I've had just a terrible last few weeks
Anyways, no returns for you I'm afraid |p1
But I completly understand where I went wrong!
Give me another 100 and we'll be rich!
lstDialogTwo: With the economy being what it is an' all
Anyways, I thought I'd share some of my new found 'dosh'
lstOutcomeYesText: Hehehe, I will begin to round up the creatures immediatly
lstOutcomeNoText: Thats a shame, I'll be back soon with no doubt another noble cause
lstCantAffordText: Oh dear, it looks like you can't afford to help m-I mean..the needy
